title: 4fo2tkirxw
author: 4fo2tkirxw
content: Can you suggest similar sites to aiscore.com but with faster information updates?

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 04, 2022, 03:08:54 PMCan you suggest similar sites to aiscore.com but with faster information updates?I am not aware of aiscore site but it looks like a sports site that give live match score updates mainly related to football.Does this site also offer betting on these matches or it is just for viewing the live score of all the matches in a single site? Also i hope you are not advertising the site in an indirect way

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Can you provide the specs for the quick update in question? is it about promotional information that gives a pop-up to your phone screen? or email updates that the casino you are using is having an event?Try visiting a casino that provides users to activate subscription news. As I often do to get the latest information updates that do not miss some promotions.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Just found out about this aiscore is a whole sports betting but I don't understand with the fast update of information, is it prediction or other analysis?Looking at aiscore here, you can also place bets and choose what the bookie offers but I don't know, other than what I know on this forum, outside the forum I've never recognized it.Check the gambling section of the board there are lots of sportsbook sites.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on June 04, 2022, 03:17:16 PMI am not aware of aiscore site but it looks like a sports site that give live match score updates mainly related to football.It's not only for football actually, you can click that football word~dropdown and see lots of games with almost all updates of the previous games all over the world.Quote from: noormcs5 on June 04, 2022, 03:17:16 PMDoes this site also offer betting on these matches or it is just for viewing the live score of all the matches in a single site?I found it not, seems this is more just stats and information of all the games, but as what op is trying to ask, its more like doesnt have a realtime updates.Quote from: noormcs5 on June 04, 2022, 03:17:16 PMAlso i hope you are not advertising the site in an indirect way  It doesnt matter, it seems like the site is completely helpful if you're into sportbetting, checking a team's previous will give you good analysis on what team you're going to bet for upcoming games.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: I'm wondering why OP is desperately searching for a fastest server to get the update of sports score. Do you have the plan to get the updates quickly for placing bets on the game? Perhaps, you won't be successful if you have made this plan. You have created two more threads recently by asking similar thing. I don't see the reason of doing it. You have the option to edit your previous topic and ask for the information there. Your enquiries are almost same1. Can you suggest a crypto sportsbook with video streaming of sporting events?2.  Does anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than sports book bet 365

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 04, 2022, 03:08:54 PMCan you suggest similar sites to aiscore.com but with faster information updates?^ Probably this is a new gambling casino, unfortunately, I cannot view it on the Who.is because it is temporarily down and I don't know what is the reason.I checked it and it seems they have a website and app interface that you can choose, there are too many matches there in different games and leagues but no one knows here about them. Are they accept BTC upon depositing? I rather want to bet on sportsbet.io than on this gambling casino which I don't know about. If you can give more insight much better.

comments.author: qevokemusic
comments.body: This is a match broadcasting website A man is looking for a similar site but with faster streaming

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: qevokemusic on June 04, 2022, 09:45:45 PMThis is a match broadcasting website A man is looking for a similar site but with faster streamingThis will depend on his location, some site works faster if you are living on a good country and some are not for some reason. Broadcasting site also have their own frequency standard, I don’t know if this is all about gambling but to OP, we can’t help you if you only provide this kind of information, better to be more specific and well detailed next time so we can also know if you are on the right thread. Streaming speed will also depends on your internet connection, this can be a big thing and if still having trouble, better to check your connections first.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.created_time: June 04, 2022, 10:08:42 PMLast edit: June 04, 2022, 11:53:13 PM by acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on June 04, 2022, 06:52:24 PMDo you have the plan to get the updates quickly for placing bets on the game? this is what I think OP is trying to do, OP is finding a way to cheat on live betting(as far as I know in live betting you can place bets while the game is currently in play, or am I wrong?) and that is why the OP is looking for a sports streaming that has the fastest information updates. I also remember reading something like this or perhaps something similar somewhere before, I'm just not sure if it is here on the forum or on an article somewhere.

comments.author: Distinctin
comments.body: It looks like it's a live score of all available games. you can try the following sites that I'm using currently. (1) https://www.livescore.com/en/(2) https://www.sofascore.com/(3) https://www.livescore.com/en/

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: What websites you use for live scores? @OP you can see that besides aiscore there are also others, we are more dominant using flashscore. Sometimes not long ago I personally often visit this qzscore.org Quote from: qevokemusic on June 04, 2022, 09:45:45 PMA man is looking for a similar site but with faster streamingI haven't found faster live score streaming platform, usually it's a few seconds late but if you want to bet and deliberately trick the bookie then you can't do it, when the ball is already on the dangerous line, the market automatically closes.

comments.author: Rating Place
comments.body: OP is trying to get game information before the sportsbook. It's almost impossible to beat a sportsbook since this is their business and they are on top of it. In smaller markets, radio may beat the book. Radio is the only chance since all video is delayed. It also depends on how fast the book confirms bets.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: What do you mean by faster Information updates? is this something to do with registration or KYC? actually just now that i heard this site and also as i check it is a sportsbook also .why this site when there are so many legit and long time running sports betting site here ? is there any thing that this can do for you to be important?

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Quote from: qevokemusic on June 04, 2022, 09:45:45 PMThis is a match broadcasting website A man is looking for a similar site but with faster streamingI don't know for what reason he's looking for the fastest streaming service. According to me it might be for the purpose of placing some bets. Recently I had an experience, my friend was watching the match live on the stadium and I was watching it on the television. My friend gave a call when the match got over, but in the television the match is going on. Maybe OP is trying to make precise predictions on live betting.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: Vaskiy on June 06, 2022, 03:27:07 AMQuote from: qevokemusic on June 04, 2022, 09:45:45 PMThis is a match broadcasting website A man is looking for a similar site but with faster streamingI don't know for what reason he's looking for the fastest streaming service. According to me it might be for the purpose of placing some bets. Recently I had an experience, my friend was watching the match live on the stadium and I was watching it on the television. My friend gave a call when the match got over, but in the television the match is going on. Maybe OP is trying to make precise predictions on live betting.The user you are replying is kind of promoting his own by the looks of his username. Obviously OP is new here and is looking for sportsbetting site like aiscore.com. He must be betting there but this aiscore.com is not for crypto. A few more days of going back in the forum, OP will learn to find the list of sportsbook and even compare them all. To get him there fast, this this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5333602.0

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: 2 x made a thread with all things fast, do you think speed on livescores can make you place a bet on bookies and win that bet because you already know the result before bookies update the score on their website? even though the bookies have not updated the odds and everything in live betting but you will not be able to beat the speed of the bookies even if you watch the match live in the field the bookies will always be the fastest.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: Peeps Place on June 05, 2022, 04:33:31 PMOP is trying to get game information before the sportsbook. It's almost impossible to beat a sportsbook since this is their business and they are on top of it. In smaller markets, radio may beat the book. Radio is the only chance since all video is delayed. It also depends on how fast the book confirms bets. Yeah, his intention is clear here. But he isn't going to get the success in it. The bookmakers depends on their odds provider. The odds provider close the betting option as soon as possible when there is significant changes in a sports event. Then they update and enable the betting option after few seconds. The odds provider do these things carefully and very quickly. It won't be easy to beat the odds provider by getting faster information. Moreover, bookmaker will block the user account if anyone can do it.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: If you are looking for sports news, score, standing, and other stuff, you can use Yahoo sports. They also have a mobile app. I am not sure what this particular website does but it seems similar to yahoo sports. There is0 a delay of a few seconds, which is common with all live streaming platforms.

comments.author: mak013
comments.body: The best way to the OP is to unity all his threads and to say what he want to do, for what purposes he needs it. Sometimes it can be better to use not the fastest site but to use just one site with the highest usability. It may be faster and easy to use. But the same time its is possible that the OP wants to create some program assists gambling probably. In this way he may need the fastest site. Anyway, it`s better to get all answers in one thread.
